attributes.name: Mossbourne Gauntlets
attributes.description: They keep your hands warm and they're delicious in soup.
attributes.parsed_description: They keep your hands warm and they're delicious in soup.

attributes.name: Mossbourne Gloves
attributes.description: "If you get hungry, just eat a fingertip or two and claim you found them as fingerless gloves."
attributes.parsed_description: "If you get hungry, just eat a fingertip or two and claim you found them as fingerless gloves."

attributes.name: Mossbourne Hat
attributes.description: Very water repellent.

attributes.name: Mossbourne Headgear
attributes.description: Stylish and Earthy

attributes.name: Mossbourne Helm
attributes.description: The armorers are always asking to study this sort of gear.
attributes.parsed_description: The armorers are always asking to study this sort of gear.

attributes.name: Mossbourne Mitts
attributes.description: They keep your hands warm and they're delicious in soup.
attributes.parsed_description: They keep your hands warm and they're delicious in soup.

attributes.name: Mossbourne Pants
attributes.description: "Let's pretend that smell is coming from the pants, and not from you, shall we?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Let's pretend that smell is coming from the pants, and not from you, shall we?"

attributes.name: Mossbourne Shirt
attributes.description: This shirt bends surprisingly far without cracking.
attributes.parsed_description: This shirt bends surprisingly far without cracking.

attributes.name: Mossbourne Trousers
attributes.description: "Let's pretend that smell is coming from the trousers, and not from you, shall we?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Let's pretend that smell is coming from the trousers, and not from you, shall we?"

attributes.name: Mourningdale Enforcer's Breastplate
attributes.description: A heavy breastplate marked with the colors of Mourningdale, given as a gift for helping the townspeople.
attributes.parsed_description: A heavy breastplate marked with the colors of Mourningdale, given as a gift for helping the townspeople.

attributes.name: Mourning Veil
attributes.description: "Sorrow wraps this amulet, as insubstatial as a sigh, yet as strong as iron."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sorrow wraps this amulet, as insubstatial as a sigh, yet as strong as iron."

attributes.name: Myrkgaardian's Legguards
attributes.description: "The Corrupted of Myrkgaard are always dressed for battle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Corrupted of Myrkgaard are always dressed for battle."

attributes.name: Nakashima's Keepsake
attributes.description: A necklace with an etching of someone the former wearer held close to their heart.
attributes.parsed_description: A necklace with an etching of someone the former wearer held close to their heart.

attributes.name: Nature's Recourse
attributes.description: "There is a deep sense of comfort hidden within the forest, and an even deeper sense of sorrow."
attributes.parsed_description: "There is a deep sense of comfort hidden within the forest, and an even deeper sense of sorrow."

attributes.name: Navigator's Tunic
attributes.description: "Sailors often prefer lighter armor in case their ship should run into any sort of trouble."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sailors often prefer lighter armor in case their ship should run into any sort of trouble."

attributes.name: Nimble Treads
attributes.description: "Tread quickly."

attributes.name: Oath of Abiogenesis
attributes.description: "Let the wild places flourish without a guiding hand, let the forests grow rampant to cover the land."
attributes.parsed_description: "Let the wild places flourish without a guiding hand, let the forests grow rampant to cover the land."

attributes.name: Oath of the Blood-Sealed Pact
attributes.description: "Sworn to sow Disorder, may the pact itself be broken and chaos be unleashed."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sworn to sow Disorder, may the pact itself be broken and chaos be unleashed."
